body:
I see; haven't tested it.  I was confused mostly because I thought we had 
trouble getting the el5 build to work at all with jsp precompilation, but 
I don't remember exactly.  Anyway, for now I'll only leave in the '-P 
tomcat6' profile option for el6.

On Tue, 15 Sep 2015, Brian Bockelman wrote:

> Compilation works, but do the resulting binaries function?
> 
> That's the problem I hit in tomcat7: a bunch of code that compiled fine but
> was missing classes at runtime.
> 
> Sent from my iPhone
> 
> > On Sep 15, 2015, at 6:33 PM, edquist notifications@github.com wrote:
> > 
> > Actually, confusingly, with this patch the jsp precompilation appears to
> > work for el5 also...
> > 
> > https://koji-hub.batlab.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=184680
> > 
> > —
> > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on
> GitHub.[AFREBQnRS7GDtwx5dWkMtqZi34IF8Wxvks5oyKRagaJpZM4F-Bt6.gif]
